name: Santa's Outback Gift Run
description:
Santa is delivering gifts around the world, all goes well until he goes to his last destination: the Northern Territory. Santa’s sleigh explodes, he falls out of the sky and lands in the outback. Even in face of such adversity, he decides to continue on foot to deliver gifts, trying to his best to navigate the outback and survive the deadly wildlife. 

Deliver as many gifts as you can before time runs out… or worse…

Controls:

  • Movement: WASD
  • Pause Menu: Esc
  • Attack: Spacebar (Just plays the animation doesn't actualy do anything yet)

Download Instructions:

  1. Download Zip file
  2. Unzip the file
  3. Run the 'NT Game Jam 2021.exe' file
  4. Enjoy!

Known Bugs:

  • Status Effects dont go away (it broke last minute ;-;)
  • After returning to the main menu from the gameplay, the quit button stops working. To quit either alt+f4 or click play and use the in-game pause menu (esc) to quit (The pause menu works on the tutorial page as well).
